comment.author: 21647809@N04
comment._content:
I think the shot was taken from a point on the hill behind North Sydney, not Lavender Bay itself (perhaps Holterman's Tower in the grounds of Shore School)... here is shot I took in 2012 from a similar position.

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/johncowper/7660064744/in/photostream/]

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/johncowper] Thank you John, we think you might be right, a great comparison shot!
